'''Zhuhan''' {{Lang|zh=珠函|zh_rm=Zhūhán}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Teyvat]] storyline [[Archon Quests]], Chapter II, Prologue: [[Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves]]. She is in charge of the registration for The Crux Clash.
